title: Mairi Gougeon – 2021 Comments on the Seafood Industry and Brexit
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Mairi Gougeon, the Scottish Rural Affairs Secretary, on 11 June 2021.
content:
Six months on from Brexit and the seafood sector is still trying to work through the red tape and barriers to trade imposed by a damaging and last minute deal.
